item.title: Converts a 2D array to a collection
item.description: Simple conversion of an array into a collection Snippet Run it Minimized version Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * Converts a 2D array to a collection. * * @param {Array.<Array.<any>>} array * @returns {Array.<object>} */ function arrayToCollection_(array) { return array.slice(1).map( (_, rowIndex) => array[0].

item.title: Sheets datetime converter
item.description: Snippet Run it Relations Sheets datetime converter Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * Converts date-time to numeric Sheets format * * @param {(number|Date)} date JS Date or time in ms * @param {number} timezoneOffset * @return {number} Google Sheets Date number */ function toGoogleSheetsDateNumber(date, timezoneOffset) { const _date = new Date(date); timezoneOffset = timezoneOffset || _date.

item.title: Date range iterator
item.description: Snippet Run it Date range iterator Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /* exported makeDatesRangeIterator */ /** * * @param {Date} start * @param {Date} end * @param {number} step ms */ function* makeDatesRangeIterator_(start, end, step = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) { const _start = new Date(start); let _iterationCount = 0; while (_start <= end) { _iterationCount++; yield _start; _start.

item.title: Get file/folder ID from url
item.description: Snippet Run it Test Get file/folder ID from url Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * Gets ID from URL * * @param {string} url The file url * @returns {string} The file id */ function getIdFromUrl(url) { const match = url.match(/[\w-_]{15,}/); return match ?

item.title: Column names to numbers and vice versa
item.description: Define Base 26 ABC Snippet Test The short list of the first 250 numbers Art Column names to number Numbers to column name Column names to numbers and vice versa Define Base 26 ABC A26 = a26 = 110 B26 = b26 = 210 C26 = c26 = 310 … Y26 = y26 = 2510 Z26 = z26 = 2610 AA26 = aa26 = 2710 … ZZ26 = zz26 = 70210 There are several base 26 types.
